TextLibrary.Text: The next biggest trail goes through the Pleione System.
The next biggest trail goes through the Pleione System.
I might be the first one to ask this, kid, but what exactly are we going to do when we catch these things?
I might be the first one to ask this, kid, but what exactly are we going to do when we catch these things?
We get any information we can and then we report back to MRI headquarters on Serpens Prime. Is that okay, Sable?
We get any information we can and then we report back to MRI headquarters on Serpens Prime. Is that okay, Sable?
It is a good plan. While we have their trail, we would be foolish to leave it. We may be able to find valuable information.
